explanation: The clause only states that the Disclosing Party (and its representatives) makes no warranties and has no obligation to provide or update information. It does not address whether either party is obligated (or not obligated) to proceed with any proposed transaction or business relationship. Therefore, the NDA lacks the required ‘no obligation to proceed’ language for both parties.
rule: Clarify that neither party is obligated to proceed with any proposed transaction or business relationship as a result of the NDA.
exampleLanguage: Nothing herein shall obligate either party to proceed with any transaction between them, and each party reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate the discussions contemplated by this Agreement. (thriveacquisition.com)
